nodes.text: Kuna's Tail was a location in the Moddell sector of the Outer Rim Territories. Before the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, Kuna's Tail was featured as part of a map composed by Corporal Ractivelle of the Stardust unit for the preparation of the Rebel Alliance's attack on the second Death Star.

Before the Battle of Endor, the map of the Moddell sector and the accompanying navigational reports were archived in The Rebel Files, a central data archive that contained secret rebel documents and reports. In 34 ABY, The Rebel Files were rediscovered and ultimately given to the Resistance.
Kuna's Tail was first mentioned in Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 18, a canon magazine first released in 2015 and published by De Agostini.
